About Me

Stephanie Balogun

Professional Film Colorist

With over 5 years of experience in the film industry, I've developed a keen eye for color and a deep understanding of how it can enhance storytelling. My work spans Films, commercials, and music videos, each project bringing its own unique challenges and creative opportunities.

I believe that color grading is more than just technical adjustment – it's an art form that can transform the emotional impact of every frame.

Experience & Expertise

Color Grading

Expert in creating distinctive looks and maintaining consistency across projects.

Technical Expertise

Proficient in industry-standard color grading software and workflows.

Collaboration

Strong communication skills and experience working with diverse creative teams.

Tools & Software

DaVinci Resolve

Adobe Premiere Pro

Baselight

FilmLight

Ready to Collaborate?

Let's create something extraordinary together. I'm always excited to take on new projects and challenges.
